TextBox Effect and Text: Welcome to my humble shop young traveler. Please have a taste of this delicious baguette. It’s the best around.
My young friend, have a piece of bread. It will help you on your dutyfull journey.
Have you heard the rumors young rodent ? In his path, the last king scattered the four divine ingredients all around the world. They are guarded by his best chefs.
You are not the first of your kind I happen to meet. I liked the last one. I hope he is alright.
It's dangerous to go there alone, here, take some bread, it will restore you.
You seem tired, you look like you really need some rest.
Did you know that this kingdom is very ancient? The numerous ruins present testify to its glorious past ages.
What is that exquisite smell coming from your bag ? It looks like a real treat.
The legend speaks of a strange creature buried deep in the vegetable forest. I wonder if they know how to cook too.
The master of the vegetable forest is an excellent cook, they say his talents are almost... from beyond the grave.
A long time ago, I met a young mouse, like you, who dreamed of becoming the greatest chef in the world. I wonder if he was the former king…
Have you ever had the soup that flows around here? It's delicious, perfect for dipping bread.
Ahhhh, it's you! Here, this batch just came out of the oven. Eat, it's still hot.
All the vegetables wandering here are poor cooks, but each has a talent that makes a difference. Maybe by teaming up, they would be skilled.
Be careful in this forest, it has no shortage of dark places, perfect for an ambush.
Do you want some of this good crusty bread? If you eat enough of it, you'll have a moustache as beautiful as mine.
I was a great cook, like you, once. Then I ate one dish too many.
Do you hear that, the sound of the crust cracking and the dough sizzling, bread is truly a delicious dish, by the way, take a bit.
You need strength for your journey. Eat my bread, little mouse, Eat my bread…
The art of bread-making has been passed down in my family from generation to generation, my family passes down its secret recipe, created by my ancestor, Painpain de la Mie Croustillante.
Once, I came across a strange mouse; it was one-eyed, wore black armour, and had a mechanical arm. She was cooking with a huge sword, she seemed tired, but she had a nice cape.
They say that beyond the northern mountains, there are great flying creatures who master the art of barbecue like no one else.
If you see a merchant in a big black coat who greets you by shouting "HELLO," don't listen to him, his products are spoilt (and I hate competition).
I will have to visit your homeland one day, I'm sure it's a charming place (and full of business opportunities).
Do you have any bread at home ? Surely not as good as mine.
One day I saw a green mouse, it seemed to be upset with the pots.
The king's throne is well guarded. You will need to become stronger to face him, take a piece of bread.
This kingdom is full of opportunity, especially for a merchant like me.
Don't be fooled by the smell and appearance of the fish, they are tough.
Eggplants are dumb brutes, but resilient, and surprisingly skilled as labour.
Onions act tough, but deep down, there's a layer of tenderness. I'm not saying that onions wear layers.
The reigning head chef of the forest has an ego as immense as his prominent brain.
Don't forget to add sauces to your dishes, it will enhance their flavour and give them a kick. And you can use my delicious bread to eat what's left. A pure delight, isn't it ?
If you happen to meet a Banana named Pedro, He’s a friend. Please give him my regards.

The other night, while walking in the forest, I saw a strange cabin illuminated by the full moon. The man who lived there offered to play cards with me, I politely declined, he wasn't very reassuring.
The life of an adventurer can be very monotonous. Don't get lost in the loop, hero.
One day, a man told me about a crow warrior reaping souls, he looked crazy, some stories are surely lies.
Don't forget, if you attract their attention, the gods will watch over you.
